org.deeplearning4j.iterativereduce.actor.core.actor

Class MasterActor<E extends Updateable<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • org.deeplearning4j.iterativereduce.actor.core.actor.MasterActor<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor, DeepLearningConfigurable, ComputableMaster<E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MasterActor

    public abstract class MasterActor<E extends Updateable<?>>
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
implements DeepLearningConfigurable, ComputableMaster<E>
    Handles a set of workers and acts as a parameter server for iterative reduce
    Author:
    Adam Gibson
